info.title: Legal Document Content Types - Read
info.description: This synchronous inbound service is based on the OData protocol and helps you to read the content types through an API call. Content types describe the purpose of the document, for example 'Amendment' or 'Master Agreement'. This service contains legal document content type and content type text nodes. Using this service, you can read the content type maintained in the configuration.

x-sap-shortText: Use this API to read content types of legal documents

values.text: Enterprise Contract Management and Assembly Integration(SAP_COM_0437)
[Integration to SAP Enterprise Contract Assembly(2OQ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2OQ " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_LglCntntMDocContentType HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
